title:u/pandapaxxy's Sundial M+KB breakdown
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/eazb6x/sundial_weapons_mnk_breakdown/

// Steelfeather Repeater  (PvE / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "One of a few rapid-fire autos to get random rolls in Destiny 2. And the only one to be kinetic gives you a reason to grind this seasonal gun. In PvE it has the best damage perks and reload perk through MKC and Feeding Frenzy." Recommended MW - Range or Reload.

// Patron of Lost Causes  (PvE/M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "Not exactly ideal, but for specific builds or speed runs I can see this being a potential choice." Recommended MW - Reload.

// Breachlight (PvE / M+KB)

// Gallant Charge (PvE / M+KB)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB): "Of the new weapons I can see this one becoming a terror. [...] In PvE you can get the same Demo / Swash roll that seems to be a common theme with this season, or the new Lead from Gold perk that would pair well with any armament armor bonus." Recommended MW - Reload.
dimwishlist:item=1706206669&perks=1840239774,1687452232,3523296417,4082225868
dimwishlist:item=1706206669&perks=3250034553,1687452232,3523296417,4082225868
